phrases: I am sorry.
I could not make breakfast...
Do not be stupid.
You have such a high fever!
You keep resting.
I will call school for you.
You do not have to make dinner, either.
Stay in bed.
Roger that.
Oikawa.
Here.
Otosaka.
Oh right, Otosaka was absent with a cold.
Kato.
Here.
Kijima.
Here.
Kiyama.
Here.
Konishi.
Here.
Komatsu.
Here.
Komiyama.
Episode 6 Happy You Did Not Notice
The ability is... collapse.
Collapse?
What kind of ability is that?
Who knows?
Probably something like able to destroy anything they target.
But still...
The fact that it is not destruction is kind of scary.
So, where is this guy?
Let us see... wait?
This is our condo complex that is attached to this academy.
Then, is not it natural for someone with an ability to be there?
Is that so?
This person is in their condo right now, you see?
Do not you think that is strange?
Why is that?
Parents will not be wielders of special abilities,
as it only occurs during adolescence.
I see...
Which means...
The target is home sick from school, or something like that.
Impossible!
Whoa, that is an abnormal bit of agitation.
I am sure it is a coincidence...
What is it?
Try talking to us.
My little sister...
It might be that both siblings show these symptoms after all...
Well, we are no scientists,
so let us go visit Ayumi,
and see if she really gained a special ability while we are at it.
Wait, are all of you going?
We are talking about a sick girl here.
Oh, right.
Then I guess I will go by myself...
No, wait...
Ayumi is a fan of Yusa...
If I bring her along, I am sure Ayumi would be happy.
What is wrong?
But you, fanboy, are getting in my way!
I want it to be just Tomori and Yusa!
Should I take over his body and jump
from the window to injure him or something?
I see... so that is how giraffes sleep.
That is right!
Giraffes wrap their necks around into a coil when they sleep...
Wait, there is a giraffe here?
Where?
Where?
I felt it senseless for him to come with us.
Nice going, Tomori!
But, but...
He is got a full-body protector on,
so he is fine as long as he did not fall head first.
We have someone injured, so please bring an ambulance right away.
Now, the three of us can go visit the ill after school.
I would like to buy a get-well gift, so let us swing by a convenience store.
Yes, yes!
I want to buy something as well!
I was just thinking I wanted to buy packaged porridge packs on my way home.
Then, shall we eat the same thing as Ayumi and have porridge for dinner?
Sounds good.
You guys can eat freely once you get home, cannot you?
If we get in the way, we can...
We should all eat together, though!
Why is that?
That is because...
I am living away from my parents too, so I am all alone even if I go home.
I am used to being alone,
but Kurobane just moved out recently, so maybe what she says is true.
No, Yusa is not the only one...
I swore in my heart that I will not trust anyone ever again.
I snuck out of that school.
Her parents sold her off to scientists,
and she no longer could trust anyone
and still is all alone...
The fact I have a little sister makes me more fortunate.
Fine.
We can all eat porridge for dinner together.
Your total is 1360 yen.
This goes over my budget.
Oh I will pay for this.
And these, too.
Why stewed enoki mushrooms?
Are not stewed enoki mushrooms the best?
It is perfect on top of porridge, too!
That is just your personal tastes...
well, I do not care as long as you are paying for it.
Yes, I am fine with that.
Um, that can of cookies back there... can I have that?
I have never seen anyone buy that before!
It will be 2500 yen
And it is expensive!
To top it off, what is this paper bag?
but I have never seen this paper bag, either!
Thank you so much!
It is this room.
My little sister is a pretty huge fan of yours.
That makes me look forward to seeing her even more!
However!
She is currently in bed with a fever...
we cannot get her too excited.
At the least, she will get a nosebleed.
I would like things to be gradual,
like Hey?
Can that really be Yusarin?
or something like that.
Then I will have my disguise mask on.
All right!
Then, can you hang out here for a bit?
Guests?
Who are they?
Big Brother
Yu is home!
Oh, elder brother sir, sorry to be intruding!
I am Nomura, the class representative!
We came here in order to visit Ayucchi while she is sick!
I am Oikawa.
Your little sister is allowing me to be her friend.
It is a pleasure meeting you.
Can your brown-nosing be more obvious than that?
You already got denied once.
Ayucchi will hate you even more if you do that!
So this is the guy that asked Ayumi out and got dumped..?
Sorry to barge in with so many people!
Come on, both of you, let us go home!
Elder brother sir, sorry to be so rowdy!
And Ayucchi, get better soon!
Hello!
Excuse me, or rather, sorry for coming in already!
Wait!
I did not call for you yet!
I thought it was just a personnel swap...
It is Big Sister Tomori!
You got to see me again, see?
Can it be that you are now Big Brother's girlfriend?
No way!
But you guys make a good couple...
Well... we have one more guest.
Nice to meet you.
Yu sa ri n...
She saw through me instantly!
I will stop her bleeding!
Make sure to breathe from your mouth.
There, it stopped now.
You are right!
That is amazing!
I am so glad.
Yu sa ri n...
I will stop her bleeding!
Should I cast my magic charm that stops nosebleeds?
No, I think it will do the opposite of what you intend, so please do not...
Yusarin in the flesh.
Boy, was I surprised!
You finally calmed down?
I am glad!
Oh, these are some cookies as a get-well gift.
I will leave them here!
N-No way!
I made Yusarin worry about me!
She is nothing more than one of my classmates right now.
Do not think about it too much.
Right, right!
Her speech patterns are starting to catch on already...
And the get-well gift from me is... this!
I love those!
Do you have an appetite?
We bought some pouched porridge.
What about you, Big Brother?
We are eating porridge, too.
Porridge for all!
Time to eat!
It is super-duper-delicious!
Is not it?
Is not it?
Thank you for the meal!
Thank you for the meal...
Excuse me.
Thank you for the hard work.
Yes...
Yes, I understand.
Excuse me now...
I am so sorry, I have to go work now!
You are talking to a current showbiz celebrity.
Do not complain.
That is exactly correct!
Please do your best at your work!
Sure!
With that, I will be going now.
Ayumi, please get better soon!
Yusarin!
Thank you so much for coming!
Gratitude and thankfulness falling like rain and hail!
Then I guess we will clean up now.
You are not going to wash them?
You can wash this many dishes at any point in time.
What blood type are you?
I am washing it now.
You can at least dry them with a dishcloth!
S-Sure...
So you two really might be dating and keeping it a secret from Ayu!
That will not happen.
You two are so compatible!
Is that how you hide your bashfulness?
You are seriously wrong.
Come now...
Ayu thinks you two are totally a great couple.
Attractive and intelligent boys like this chump is someone
I can never be a good match for.
I think you are such a good match that you are even too good for Big Brother Yu.
Do not be fooled, Ayumi!
Realize that all the compliments are contradicting as she used the word chump!
Come on, shut up and go watch some TV.
Fine.
Wow, that was fast!
Yusarin moves at amazing speeds!
That is pre-recorded...
Oh, I see...
Here, some medicine.
You turn in for today.
I will tuck you in.
It is a good thing you have a great big brother.
Yeah, but I am slightly scared of going to sleep...
What is wrong?
I had a scary dream this afternoon.
Well, if you have a fever, it is common for you to have a nightmare,
so there is nothing to be uneasy about.
By the way, what kind of dream was it?
Do not ask something like that because it will remind her of the nightmare!
Indeed...
Then, I will be going now.
Sorry to have bothered you.
I am eagerly awaiting your next patronage.
I will see her off.
I will be right back.
Really, it is nothing like that.
Please ask her what the nightmare was about.
It might be a clue in figuring out what the collapse ability is.
Wait.
We still do not have proof that Ayumi is the wielder of the special ability.
It can be someone else that lives in this condo complex...
It is true that we do not have proof.
But, the possibility is very high.
And collapse...
I cannot help but feel that it will be a dangerous ability.
That is the same terror that I initially felt.
So, get it out of her.
This will be for Ayumi as well.
All right.
Even if her fever goes down, make her stay home tomorrow just in case.
At present, we just have too few information.
Yeah...
I am back.
Hey, Ayumi.
Can you tell me what that dream you mentioned earlier was about?
Well, I do not remember it well...
You can just give me a vague idea.
A dream where something breaks.
What did?
I think... the ground?
What kind of ground was it?
I cannot remember that much...
It was like there were cracks in the ground and splitting up...
Why do you ask that?
Would not it be scary if that dream came true?
Ayu is the type that does not believe in spiritual stories like that...
The world is full of spiritual things, though.
The ground splitting up?
Is that some kind of a hint?
Maybe that ability is something
so horrible that it will also rope in the person using it.
We still have too few information after all...
What should we do?
For now, we can use the large number
of surveillance cameras set up at the middle school
to see which way the ability is headed.
Other than that, probably just letting the teachers know to look out for Ayumi.
The middle school has a lot of people, so it is dangerous if something happens.
It is a lot safer at the condo complex.
I would like to gather a bit more information, so have her stay home again tomorrow.
Yeah, I will do that.
Should I go cast a magic spell that cures her cold?
There it is!
Yusarin's magic spell series, 21!
The spell for curing a cold!
Such a turn-off!
No, she will get a nosebleed again, so I would like you to pass this time...
Yes, then I will visit once she is better!
Yeah, that helps a lot.
36.5 degrees... your fever has gone down.
Ayu here has managed to finish fighting the illness,
and going to do her best like she usually does!
You did not have a weird dream, right?
Correct.
But you are still recovering.
I think you should stay home for one more day.
It is boring to stay in bed even without a fever, so I would like to go to school.
There is still a chance that your cold will relapse,
so I cannot allow that as your big brother.
Suck it up, be a good girl, and stay in bed for one more day.
Got that?
I will contact your school.
Ayu is not so easy that you can stop her time and time again...
The grudge of the pizza sauce... will be avenged!
Are your injuries all better already?
You mean when I was pushed off from the student council room two days ago?
Yeah.
It is something that happens often,
so accidents of that level can be dealt with right away.
Though, when I first met her, it really was an instant trip to the hospital...
If I was in your shoes, I would never be able to deal with it all...
It really makes me slightly unsure of whether or not Tomori should be the leader...
She is a lot more calculating than what you are currently thinking.
Oh, she is calling us over again.
Let us hurry up and eat!
You are finally here...
Both of use were eating pasta, so we could not wolf it down.
Sorry about that.
How did you find the time to twirl a pasta around your fork to eat?
What?
Did something happen?
Ayumi is at school.
No, I contacted her school and made her stay home today as well...
How was her condition today?
The fever was down...
But I was worried about her relapsing, so I told her to stay home for one more day.
Because her temperature is normal, perhaps.
She decided to attend school from third period, based on her own decision.
I have a bad feeling about this.
Let us go check Ayumi's condition right away.
Nice seeing you!
Um, Otosaka?
I found a sweets shop that serves really good red bean soup.
I will treat you some to celebrate you getting better.
I am sorry, but I just got better, so I will have to pass.
H-Hold on a second!
If right after getting better is bad, how about we go on the weekend...
You really do not get it, do you... you have been denied once already.
Just give up!
Outta my way!
I am going to make my way back through from here!
Oh, shut up, shut up!
I will do something with this guy, so Ayucchi, you can go on ahead.
Thanks, Nomu-chan.
Wait, hold on, O-Otosaka!
You do not stand a chance anymore!
Hey, wait, where are you going?
It is a shortcut.
Konishi?
It is because you showed up...
What is?
With Oikawa...
With Oikawa?
With Oikawa...
I used to eat lunch all alone.
We were supposedly dating.
But ever since you showed up, Oikawa...
Oikawa...
It is as if he is completely forgotten about me!
He looks at just you all of the time!
Wait, let us talk it out!
I am sure it is just a misunderstanding!
So put that cutter knife away!
It is your fault...
It is your fault...
It is your fault...
It is your fault...
That is not true!
That is why... you are going to see some pain!
Help... someone...
Someone..!
Help me!
This is... the collapse...
I guess we did not make it in time...
- I am going in! - You cannot!
It is too dangerous!
Ayumi...
Ayumi!
Do not go!
You will get roped into it!
Ayumi!
You there!
Get away!
It is dangerous!
Ayumi... Ayumi...
